extendedInfo.description: Manage your finances anywhere with the Android app* from Commerce Bank, serving Missouri, Kansas, Illinois, Oklahoma and Colorado. Mobile Banking is available to all personal Commerce Bank Online Banking users. Simply log in with the same Username and Password that you have established for Online Banking. You can: â¢View account balances â¢View recent transaction activity â¢Transfer funds between eligible Commerce Bank accounts â¢Find ATM and branch locations using GPS To help protect the privacy of your account information: â¢Access to your account utilizes SSL technology â¢Verify you're at the Commerce site with your Personal Security Image and Caption â¢Your account is covered by the same Online Banking Guarantee for personal accounts as it is when you use Online Banking on your personal computer (see Online Banking Terms and Conditions for full details) *Must be a Commerce Bank Online Banking user. To activate Online Banking, visit commercebank.com. Commerce Bank Mobile Banking is free from Commerce Bank. However, your wireless phone carrier's web access charges may apply. Not available to Small Business Online Banking or Wealth Manager users.

reviews.title: Needs check deposit and bill pay
reviews.comment: About time. I was thinking this would never happen from commerce. Good so far. Add picture based check deposit and online billing or make the web site work from my phone and get 5 stars. You are about a year or two behind other banks in features on mobiles.
reviews.author: Dan Durig

reviews.title: Good app but...
reviews.comment: Bout time commerce got an app. But does need online bill pay and set up features like credit card statement even though has transfer. Would be nice to look at the card statement also. But good start to it five yrs after I\'ve asked for this app almost every month
reviews.author: ben batha

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Its so easy to use, and I can use it anywhere. It is really easy to keep track of my money this way. Everybody should have this app
reviews.author: Mara Engelbert

reviews.title: Crashes every time
reviews.comment: Every time I try to open the app, it crashes once I sign in.
reviews.author: Zach Widdicombe

reviews.title: Seriously
reviews.comment: Since updating I can\'t even open it now. What a waste.
reviews.author: Marah Thompson

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: Average, BOA had a better app. But the bank sucked
reviews.author: Mike Evans

reviews.title: App update
reviews.comment: I downloaded the update and now it doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Chris Karner

reviews.title: Unimpressive, just like the bank
reviews.comment: This only provides your credit card account balance...if you need to submit a payment,  find out what you owe, and when you owe it, just go to the website. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: victoria mulugeta

reviews.title: No good
reviews.comment: Can\'t even get it to download.
reviews.author: Grayson Woollard

reviews.title: Very poor
reviews.comment: Basic app that let\'s you view bit little else. Very poor compared to USAA or Bank of America apps.
reviews.author: David Hooper

reviews.title: Deposit? Pay bills?
reviews.comment: Why can\'t I do these things?
reviews.author: ALI THORNSBERRY

reviews.title: Deposit and bill pay
reviews.comment: Needs deposit and bill pay
reviews.author: Jason barton

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: It\'s missing a few features that would be extremely helpful... Deposit from my phone, bill pay, and be able to see an image of checks submitted.  Make those available, 5 stars!
reviews.author: Megan Hartwig

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: Commerce was behind the game by waiting this long to have an application, but better late than never. Now they need to add mobile check deposit as a key feature for those of us who live in their network area but don\'t have a bank or ATM in our town.
reviews.author: Braeden Johnson

reviews.title: Need subtotal
reviews.comment: Wish they showed subtotals like they do when checking your balance online. Also my total balance is never really accurate. Simple update
reviews.author: Courtney Wall

reviews.title: Behind the technology of others
reviews.comment: WE NEED THE ABILITY TO SNAP PHOTOS OF CHECKS AND DEPOSIT THEM INSTANTLY. !
reviews.author: Chip Unterberg

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I usually just need to check my balance and transfer money.
reviews.author: Toy H

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is an awesome app for it just starting out.  For those complaining about paying bills if you are referring to your credit card you should just do a transfer.
reviews.author: Judd Heeb

reviews.title: Lakeside
reviews.comment: Will not let you transfer money between accounts.  One time went it and had wrong amounts, I freaked.  App needs fixing
reviews.author: Lesley Steinert

reviews.comment: A bll pay function would really b a good idea.
reviews.author: A Google User
